item.title: The Euler's Identity
item.author: me@ekunazanu.dev (Anchit Roy)
item.description: If you have ever enrolled in any of the STEM disciplines, chances are you would’ve come across Euler. Now there’s a lot of genius things he came up with, but one of the most well known (and also one of the most elegant) has to be the Euler’s Identity
